com.commercetools.sunrise.common.sessions

Interface SessionHandler<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Class of the object in session
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CartSessionHandler, CustomerSessionHandler, OrderSessionHandler, SessionHandlerBase

    public interface SessionHandler<T>
    Enables to manage the data kept in session of a particular object. For example, the session manager of the cart might save the ID, an instance of the mini cart and other related information in session, taking care of keeping it up to date and remove it when it's needed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void overwriteInSession(play.mvc.Http.Session session, T value)
      Replaces all the information related to the object in session with the given value.
      void removeFromSession(play.mvc.Http.Session session)
      Removes all the information related to this class.
